alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Iron; Kane; Piute; Sevier (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 06 at 9:21AM MDT until June 07 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Utah... Sevier River Near Hatch affecting Garfield, Piute, Kane, Sevier and Iron Counties. .Warm temperatures will continue to melt high mountain snowpack and maintain high river flows. For the Sevier River...including Hatch...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Sevier River Near Hatch. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 3.9 feet (1040 CFS), minor flooding will affect fields. Assorted bridges and select low lying structures will receive minor flood damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM MDT Tuesday the stage was 3.52 feet (885 CFS). - Forecast...The river will oscillate below flood stage, but above action stage, with a maximum value of 3.6 feet (894 CFS) early Wednesday. - Action stage is 3.5 feet. - Flood stage is 3.9 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Wednesday at 12 PM MDT.
